Entries.Mon8: You know, I'm relieved that Penny made the first move.$1#$e#Sebastian used to tell me that I would never be able to ask her out.$0#$b#Guess he was right.$10#$e#He still can't believe we're married.$1
Entries.Tue8: Hey, @.$1#$e#Yesterday my mother spent all evening looking at the photos of my wedding.$0#$b#She even called Pam to join her!$1
Entries.Wed8: It's nice that Vincent likes Penny so much.$1#$b#But obviously I love her more!$4
Entries.Thu8: Do you think I would be a good parent, @?$7#$e#Penny sure would be.$1#$e#We've been talking about having kids lately.$0#$b#It'd be great if they took after Penny.$1
Entries.Fri8: At first Pam disapproved my relationship with Penny.$2#$b#But I'm glad I was able to show her I'm serious about Penny.$1#$e#She was so happy at our wedding!$1
Entries.Sat8: Sometimes I feel like I should be more open with Penny about how much I care about her...$2
Entries.Sun8: I knew Penny was the one the very first moment I met her.$4#$b#I was just too nervous to approach her first.$10#$e#It seems unreal that she's my wife now...$4
Entries.spring_Mon8: I feel like the luckiest person alive with Penny by my side.$4
Entries.spring_Wed8: This might sound weird to you but...$0#$b#I always miss Penny even when I have just seen her.$4
Entries.spring_Thu8: I can't even imagine how my life was before Penny.$4#$e#She's so important to me...$4
Entries.summer_Wed8: I think I love Penny more day by day.$4
Entries.summer_Sat8: Penny and I took Vincent and Jas to the park the other day.$0#$e#They started arguing over some small thing.$2#$b#Her job sure is hard sometimes.$0
Entries.summer_Sun8: Seb thinks that Penny is really cool.$0#$b#I'm glad that my two best friends get along.$1
Entries.fall_Mon8: Pam may be overprotective with Penny.$0#$b#But that shows how much she cherishes her.$0#$e#I'll make sure I'm a great son-in-law.$1
Entries.fall_Thu8: Penny has made me realise that I wasn't spending enough time with Vincent.$0#$b#You know, he'll be grown up soon.$0
Entries.fall_Fri8: Hey, @.$0#$e#I was thinking... it still feels weird that Penny and I are married...$4
Entries.winter_Tue8: My mother absolutely loves Penny.$1#$b#She's just the perfect wife and daughter-in-law.$0
Entries.winter_Wed8: It's crazy how much I enjoy the time I spend with Penny...$4#$b#So this is what being in love feels like?$10
Entries.winter_Fri8: What kind of song do you think Penny would like the most?$1#$e#I wanted to make something special for her.$10
Entries.winter_Sun8: I'm looking forward to spending more time with Penny next year.$4
Entries.spring_12_2: Vincent keeps talking about the Egg Hunt.$0#$b#He even asked Penny and I to join him.$0#$b#But I think we're going to leave it for another year.$0
Entries.spring_23_2: Penny is excited for the Flower Festival.$0#$e#I'm sure she'll look beautiful as always.$4#$e#She's my wife, after all...$4
Entries.fall_2_2: Yesterday I asked my mother to help me make some muffins.$0#$b#You know, for Penny's birthday.$0#$b#But it didn't end very well...$2#$b#So I decided to buy a poppy from Pierre's.$0
Entries.winter_7_2: Penny and I are going to build a snowman tomorrow at the Festival of Ice.$1#$e#Are you going to join the fishing competition, @?$0
